test.name: test assignment

kw.name: Open pantip and get all comment
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance. Use this keyword for quick experiments or debugging sessions.
kw.msg: Open Browser is for quick experimentation and debugging only. Use New Page for production.

{ "acceptDownloads": true, "bypassCSP": true, "forcedColors": "none", "hideRfBrowser": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "viewport": { "height": 720, "width": 1280 }, "deprecated_pos_args": [] }

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'bypassCSP': True, 'forcedColors': 'none', 'hideRfBrowser': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'viewport': {'height': 720, 'width': 1280}, 'deprecated_pos_args': []}

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Keyword 'Take Screenshot fail-screenshot-{index}' could not be run on failure: TimeoutError: page.screenshot: Timeout 10000ms exceeded. =========================== logs =========================== taking page screenshot ============================================================
